CustomField.description: To be used by DGR& Product Admin user, and Services Intake Manager/DGC permission set user to close and reject the entire DGR approval request
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c, 'Submitted'), ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c, 'Rejected') ), HYPERLINK('/apex/ApprovalRequestClosedAsRejected?appReqId=' & Id, 'Close as Rejected' ,'_parent') & ' ', '' )
CustomField.label: <font color="#fff">
